name: Minority Female Founder Grant
description: Competitive grants for U.S. businesses led by minority women entrepreneurs.
ui_questions: Is your business at least 51% owned and managed by a minority woman?
Is your business registered and active in the United States?
How many years has your business been operating?
How many people are employed by your business?
What was your most recent annual revenue?
Are you the primary decision maker for the business?
notes: Application fees may apply for some programs. SAM.gov or SF-424 registrations are not required.
human_summary: Competitive grants for U.S. businesses with at least 51% minority female ownership, under 50 employees, and less than $3M in revenue.
